abstract: Ten books by celebrated short story writer Raymond Carver will be published digitally for the first time by Vintage Books.
lead_paragraph: Ten books by the noted author, who died nearly 27 years ago, will be published digitally for the first time this week.

headline.main: The Poetry of Raymond Carver Makes a Leap to E-Books
headline.print_headline: With Improved Technology, a Legacy Leaps to E-Books

snippet: Ten books by the noted author, who died nearly 27 years ago, will be published digitally for the first time this week.
